fields.Need: to see details related to a single recent call (start time, duration, end state)
fields.Benefit: audit a particular call
fields.Story: As a calls user, I need to see details related to a single recent call (start time, duration, end state) so I can audit a particular call

fields.Need: provide my prospects with a sample app that I can call them on
fields.Benefit: demonstrate the product’s capabilities in a real-world context
fields.Story: As a SendBird sales person, I need provide my prospects with a sample app that I can call them on so I can demonstrate the product’s capabilities in a real-world context

fields.Need: any multi-device decline/timeout events to be ignored after a call has started
fields.Benefit: avoid accidentally ending an ongoing call
fields.Story: As a callee, I need any multi-device decline/timeout events to be ignored after a call has started so I can avoid accidentally ending an ongoing call

fields.Need: know how many concurrent calls a server instance can support
fields.Benefit: allocate resources propperly
fields.Story: As a platform engineer, I need know how many concurrent calls a server instance can support so I can allocate resources propperly

fields.Need: to configure my input and output devices
fields.Benefit: control the physical call experience
fields.Story: As a calls user, I need to configure my input and output devices so I can control the physical call experience

fields.Story: As a dashboard user, I need to see a report of hourly/daily/weekly call usage so I can understand my app users‘ call behavior patterns

fields.Need: be alterted to the fact that there is an ongoing EAP
fields.Benefit: decide to participate if I am interested

fields.Need: to enter my name

fields.Story: As a calls user, I need to enter my name so I can present myself to others

fields.Story: As a developer, I need standard error codes and description across all SDKs so I can debug quickly and understand issues

fields.Need: resilient network handling
fields.Benefit: prevent dropped calls and recover from poor network conditions
fields.Story: As a call participant, I need resilient network handling so I can prevent dropped calls and recover from poor network conditions

fields.Need: to accept or decline the incoming call

fields.Story: As a callee, I need to accept or decline the incoming call so I can stay in control of my interactions

fields.Need: to see a list of recent calls
